mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONTENTS ( CONTENTS_ID, SLOT_ID, CONTENTS_DATE, CONTENTS_TIME, CONTENTS_PLAN, CONTENTS_NAME, CONTENTS_DESC, CONTENTS_NUMBER, CONTENTS_ADDR, CONTENTS_LAT, CONTENTS_LNG, CONTENTS_IMAGE, CONTENTS_ICON) VALUES ( #{contents_id}, #{slot_id}, #{contents_date}, #{contents_time}, #{contents_plan}, #{contents_name}, #{contents_desc}, #{contents_number}, #{contents_addr}, #{contents_lat}, #{contents_lng}, #{contents_image}, #{contents_icon});
